data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Kurung Kumey that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kurung Kumey, Arunachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 153 believers in Kurung Kumey against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kurung Kumey, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Kurung Kumey, Arunachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Kurung Kumey prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Monpa Tawang people.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Kurung Kumey. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Kurung Kumey to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kurung Kumey, Arunachal Pradesh, India has a population of 13,900.

We estimate Kurung Kumey has 153 people who might know Jesus, 169 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,578 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Kurung Kumey, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
